text: this is a global bag and it is not only
against us it is against all the
countries that defend democracy freedom
human right and those values and those
principles which we all have always felt
very proud of I will end here my brief
declaration I want to thank the
president of the Generalitat for this
meeting I believe that it has been very
positive and I think it is important not
only that we coordinate between forces
and security and safety and bodies but
coordination between politicians could
between administrations because of this
is what people want and what is very
important what makes us more efficient
facing the future and I want to also
thank all the public officers who have
gone through this difficult situation as
you know at the present time all my
encouragement my thanks and my and to
tell you that the government will always
help you we are not here for political
world football police work but we are
here to support the police and it is
very important that they find out who
the criminals are and put them away and
that they are efficient to prevent this
from happening again so once more I want
in the name of the Spanish government
and all Spanish people who might feel
represented by my words to give the
condolences to all those families who
have suffered from this terrorist attack
and our desire that those who have been
injured recovered some are in a very
difficult situation I hope that
everybody recovers their health
